Posts.Content: bonsipsy wrote: Does anyone else have symptoms of pain and numbness in their hands following radiation? It has been suggested that I have carpal tunnel problems, but since the pain started right after radiation I am curious about a possible connection. Â Radiation neuropathy apparently exists, but there isn't much written about it on the internet that I can find. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Radiation neuropathy bonsipsy amraye
